abstrac: I will help you develop successful products
bio:
I am a very creative, experienced and knowledgeable Product Designer with a Masters Degree in Product Design from Central St Martins College of Art & Design, London, a world renowned college of Art and Design.
I have won design awards and I have worked for top design consultancies in London.
Added to this, I have got many years of experience working for myself for corporate and individual clients. I have worked on a wide variety of products and I am able to see a product designed all the way from a concept idea, through development and prototyping, to manufacture.

I am flexible in the communication times; if necessary, I can talk during the week-ends. I can communicate by email, Skype, WhatsApp, telephone, Google+ and others. I speak English, Spanish and some French.
I am able to work both on an hourly rate and on fixed fees. I divide the project in stages and I provide quotations, activities, time scales and deliverables for each stage of the Design process. The client only needs to place orders for each stage at a time. I can also provide client references and testimonials of my work.
